animeTitle: Shinkalion: Change the World - Ushinawareta Kioku
otherNames: Shinkalion: Change the World Recap, Shinkalion: Change the World Lost Memories, シンカリオン チェンジ ザ ワールド失われた記憶
synopsis:
"How did it end up like this... Where did I end up, and what did I do...?"

As the driver of the Phantom Shinkalion, Ina stood in front of Taisei and the others. What was Ina doing behind the scenes of the battle with Taisei and the others?

A special edition looking back on the past from Ina's perspective.
